input_text:: The woman refused a second beer. Please indicate the best cause: - She was the designated driver for the night. - She was familiar with the bartender.
target_text: She was the designated driver for the night.

input_text:: The girl found the missing puzzle piece. Please indicate the best effect: - She completed the puzzle. - She took apart the puzzle.
The tenant misplaced his keys to his apartment. Please indicate the best effect: - His landlord unlocked the door. - His landlord repaired the door.
The gardener pulled the weeds. Please indicate the best effect: - The weeds came out of the soil. - The weeds produced seeds.
target_text: The weeds came out of the soil.

input_text:: The man went away for the weekend. Please indicate the best cause: - He wanted to relax. - He felt content.
The surfer caught the wave. Please indicate the best effect: - The wave carried her to the shore. - She paddled her board into the ocean.
target_text: The wave carried her to the shore.

input_text:: The man took a shower. Please indicate the best cause: - He was sweaty from working out. - He opened a new bar of soap.
target_text: He was sweaty from working out.

input_text:: Our group's conversation gradually lulled to silence. Please indicate the best effect: - I felt awkward. - I became enraged.
The librarian located the book in the stacks. Please indicate the best cause: - I requested the librarian's help. - The book was checked out.
The man felt thankful to be alive. Please indicate the best cause: - He was cured of cancer. - His wife was diagnosed with cancer.
The offender violated parole. Please indicate the best effect: - She was sent back to jail. - She stole money from a church.
target_text: She was sent back to jail.

input_text:: The benefactor requested to stay anonymous. Please indicate the best cause: - He wanted to maintain his privacy. - He supported the cause behind his donation.
target_text: He wanted to maintain his privacy.

input_text:: The terrorist set off the bomb. Please indicate the best effect: - The bomb exploded. - The bomb was deactivated.
The man revealed personal information to the therapist. Please indicate the best cause: - He trusted the therapist. - He disagreed with the therapist.
The man became disabled. Please indicate the best effect: - His family offered him financial support. - His family cut off contact with him.
target_text: His family offered him financial support.

input_text:: The man had lipstick on his cheek. Please indicate the best cause: - The woman kissed him. - The woman made him blush.
My knees buckled on the stairs. Please indicate the best effect: - I caught myself on the railing. - The railing came loose from the wall.
target_text: I caught myself on the railing.

input_text:: The boy pushed his sister. Please indicate the best effect: - His sister tattled on him. - They played hide and seek.
The woman filed a restraining order against the man. Please indicate the best cause: - The man called her. - The man stalked her.
The crowd gave the band a standing ovation. Please indicate the best effect: - The band signed autographs. - The band reappeared on the stage.
The vase broke. Please indicate the best effect: - I stenciled it. - I glued it back together.
My foot went numb. Please indicate the best effect: - I put my shoes on. - I shook my foot.
The man dropped food on the floor. Please indicate the best effect: - His dog jumped up on him. - His dog ran over to eat the food.
target_text: His dog jumped up on him.

input_text:: It got dark outside. Please indicate the best effect: - Snowflakes began to fall from the sky. - The moon became visible in the sky.
target_text: Snowflakes began to fall from the sky.

input_text:: The woman received a diploma. Please indicate the best cause: - She enrolled in college. - She graduated from college.
The company lost money. Please indicate the best cause: - Its products received positive consumer reviews. - Some of its products were manufactured defectively.
target_text: Its products received positive consumer reviews.

input_text:: The documents contained important information. Please indicate the best effect: - I paper clipped them together. - I kept them in a secure place.
The man looked at his watch. Please indicate the best effect: - He realized he forgot something. - He realized he was early.
The man threw out the bread. Please indicate the best cause: - It was fresh. - It was stale.
The patient underwent the risky medical procedure. Please indicate the best cause: - The procedure was costly. - Specialists recommended the procedure.
The woman's makeup smeared. Please indicate the best cause: - She brushed her hair. - She wiped her eyes.
The police officer dropped the gun. Please indicate the best effect: - The gun recoiled. - The gun went off.
My daughter suffered an allergy attack. Please indicate the best effect: - I encouraged her to take deep breaths. - I took her to the emergency room.
target_text: I encouraged her to take deep breaths.
